Text: Hippophae is a genus of sea buckthorns, deciduous shrubs in the family Elaeagnaceae.
Triplets:<Hippophae
1:
--------------------
Text: Hippophae:  The name sea buckthorn may be hyphenated to avoid confusion with the buckthorns ("Rhamnus", family Rhamnaceae).
Triplets:<Hippophae
2:
--------------------
Text: Hippophae:  It is also referred to as sandthorn, sallowthorn, or seaberry.
Triplets:<Hippophae
